revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=HooToo |model=HT-ND001 |asin=B01M1B5T2W |fcc_date=06/02/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=MTC |manuf_model=WR1201 |type=wireless router |fcc_id=2AHVHWR1201 |pcb_id=WR1201-ZC01-01 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7602EN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=microSD Card slot, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=HT_XXXXXX |default_ip=10.10.10.252 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Dual Band Wireless Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.hootoo.com/hootoo-ac1200-dual-band-wireless-router.html}} {{SupportPage|https://www.hootoo.com/downloads-HT-ND001.html}} :''AC1200 (2.4/5GHz), 4 Antennas, USB 3.0 Port''
"WR1201-ZC01-01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *Two versions are pictured in the FCC photos, :one with internal antennas and :one with external antennas.
FCC entry also covers AMTC WR1201, AMTC WR1202, and model :numbers WR**** (* from 0 to 9). Differences are described in the [https://fccid.io/2AHVHWR1201/Test-Report/Test-Report-3014163.pdf Test Report] document on the FCC.
;Specifications *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/whats-your-favourite-cheap-lede-openwrt-device/1362/283 ''HooToo HT-ND001'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] â€¢ [https://github.com/openwrt/openwrt/commit/30a7ab8f61c8a5f1a4428f8c7cf9a1d6a12b096b ''MTC WR1201'' on '''GitHub'''] :- SoC: MediaTek MT7621A (880MHz) :- Flash: 16 MiB :- RAM: 128 MiB :- Wireless: 2.4GHz (MT7602EN) :- Wireless: 5GHz (MT7612EN) :- Ethernet speed: 10/100/1000 :- Ethernet ports: 4x LAN + 1x WAN :- 1x USB 3.0 port :- 1x microSD Card reader :- Serial baud rate: 57600
